snippet: A nonprofit organization, the One Club for Art and Copy, is taking a step to reconsider the proliferation of ad industry honors.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; nonprofit advertising organization One Club for Art and Copy is taking step to reconsider proliferation of industry honors; beginning in May 2014, organization's annual One Show will discontinue ceremonies in several award categories and present highest honors in all categories at single event; decision to pare down may influence other organizations that bestow advertising and marketing awards.
lead_paragraph: A nonprofit organization, the One Club for Art and Copy, is taking a step to reconsider the proliferation of ad industry honors.

headline.main: One Singular Sensation for Award Winners
headline.print_headline: One Singular Sensation for Award Winners

keywords.value: One Club for Art and Copy
keywords.name: organizations
